column5: Looking for suggestions within 150 miles of the Minnesota border for a fall trip for my returning Marine and his brother to hunt and fish for a week this fall. Any ideas?

LOTW out of the Morson area would be excellent. Fall fishing for muskie, walleye and crappie is outstanding. Lot's of ducks migrate through that area. And there's good deer hunting, too. If you're looking for guided fishing and/or hunting, Rick Gates out of Buena Vista Resort will put you on fish and ducks.
